artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Publisher: Yorozuya Magobei; Carver: Asai Ginjirō
catalogue_raissonne: Keyes, Courage and Silence (1982), no. 335.3; Iwakiri, Yoshitoshi (2014), p. 301.
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: portrait of a balding man with medium length wavy hair and beard, wearing yellow, black and red armor over brightly-patterned garments, including green garment with bold yellow text characters and sleeve with yellow and red swirls inside hexagons against a purple ground; green-blue background
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From A Barometer of Emotions (Seiu kandankei 情得感檀形)
signed: 応需よしとし筆 {ōju Yoshitoshi hitsu}
title: Earthquake: Actor Ichikawa Danjūrō IX as Katō Kazue-no-kami Kiyomasa
